weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm cold and white. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ You can make snowballs with me.
🧣 You need to bundle up when I fall.
⛄️ I'm used to build snowmen.

weather.question: I’m hot and yellow and give you light each day. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 Plants need me to grow.
😎 You need sunglasses when I am very bright.
🔥 I'm a star.

weather.question: I have no voice, but I can roar. I can knock down trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🌬️ I am made of moving air.
🍃 I can be gentle or destructive.
🌪️ Sailors worry about me on the sea.

weather.question: I'm a blanket in the sky, sometimes white, sometimes gray. I can bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am made of water droplets.
🌧️ I can block the sun.
✈️ Airplanes fly through me.

weather.question: I am water falling from the sky, sometimes in big drops, sometimes a drizzle. What am I?

hints.text: ☔️ You need an umbrella when I fall.
💧 Puddles form because of me.
🌱 Plants love me.

weather.question: I’m formed when water freezes in the air, and I can hurt if I hit you. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am a type of precipitation.
🤕 Sometimes I am the size of marbles.
⛈️ I often come with thunderstorms.

weather.question: I am a loud noise after a flash of light in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡️ I am a sign of a thunderstorm.
💥 I am caused by the rapid heating of air.
👂 You can hear me before you see the flash if you are far away.

weather.question: I am a swirling storm with strong winds and a calm 'eye' in the center, born over warm ocean waters. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I am given names.
🌊 I can cause flooding near the coast.
🏠 Buildings need to be strong to withstand me.

weather.question: I am a rotating column of air extending from a cloud to the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I am often seen in flat areas of land.
🐄 I can lift things like cars and cows!
⚠️ Taking shelter is important if one is near.

weather.question: I am a condition where it doesn't rain for a long time, making the land very dry. What am I?

hints.text: 🏜️ I can cause crops to fail.
🔥 Wildfires are more likely when I am present.
💧 People need to conserve water during me.

cosmos.question: I shine bright in the night sky, but I'm not a star. I travel around a planet. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Sometimes I'm full, sometimes I'm a crescent.
🧀 People once thought I was made of cheese.
🌎 I orbit the Earth.

cosmos.question: I am hot and give light and warmth to the Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I'm a giant ball of burning gas.
☀️ Plants need me to grow.
😎 You shouldn't look directly at me.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of rock and I travel around the Sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 You live on me!
🌿 I have lots of plants and animals.
💧 I'm mostly covered in water.

cosmos.question: I am known as the Red Planet. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 People are planning to visit me one day.
🏜️ I have rusty-colored soil.
🍫 My name is similar to a popular candy bar.

cosmos.question: I'm the biggest planet in our solar system and have a giant red spot. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 That spot is actually a huge storm!
💨 I'm made mostly of gas.
🪐 My name comes from the king of the Roman gods.

cosmos.question: I have beautiful rings around me, made of ice and rock. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are very wide but very thin.
🪐 I'm the sixth planet from the Sun.
👨‍🌾 My name comes from the Roman god of agriculture.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a pattern in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ursa Sometimes I look like an animal. (Like Ursa Major)
🔭 People use me to navigate.
📜 My name comes from ancient stories.

cosmos.question: I am a huge collection of stars, gas, and dust, held together by gravity. Our solar system is part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍬 I'm often shaped like a spiral with arms.
🥛 My name sounds like a white liquid.
🌌 There are billions of others like me in the universe.

cosmos.question: I'm a rock from space that hits Earth's atmosphere and burns up, creating a bright streak of light. What am I?

hints.text: 🌠 People sometimes call me a shooting star.
☄️ If I don't burn up completely, I can hit the ground.
🔥 The friction causes me to glow.

cosmos.question: I'm a giant cloud of gas and dust in space where stars are born. What am I?

hints.text: 🎨 I can be very colorful.
✨ New stars begin here.
💨 I'm made of hydrogen, helium, and dust.
